meanings.definition: A type of luxury hotel in Spain.
meanings.sent1: We stayed at one of the beautiful paradors during our vacation in Spain.
meanings.sent2: The paradors in Spain offer stunning views and top-notch service.
meanings.sent3: The paradors in Spain are so fancy, even the pigeons wear tiny top hats.
meanings.sent4: The paradors stood like majestic castles against the Spanish sunset.
meanings.sent5: The luxurious paradors in Spain made our trip unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'parador'.
meanings.sent1: There are many paradors scattered across the Spanish countryside.
meanings.sent2: The guidebook listed several paradors as must-visit destinations.
meanings.sent3: The paradors looked like a flock of elegant swans in the distance.
meanings.sent4: The paradors gleamed like precious gems in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The paradors beckoned travelers with their promise of comfort and luxury.
